Headline: #29 State Temporary Reroute near Kinzie/Dearborn
ShortDescription: 29 State, 62 Archer and 36 Broadway buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions near Kinzie/Dearborn, due to street blockage near Kinzie/Dearborn.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How will this affect my trip?

 

#29 State, #62 Archer and #36 Broadway buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions near Kinzie/Dearborn, due to street blockage near Kinzie/Dearborn.

Southbound #62 Archer buses will operate via Dearborn, Hubbard, Clark, Wacker, Dearborn and over regular route.

Northbound #62 Archer buses will operate via State, Wacker, Clark, Hubbard, Dearborn and over regular route.

#29 State and #36 Broadway buses will operate via State, Hubbard, Clark, Wacker, State and over regular route.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: 63rd-bound Green Line Delays
ShortDescription: 63rd-bound Green Line trains are running with residual delays following an earlier sick passenger near Central. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
63rd-bound Green Line trains are running with residual delays following an earlier sick passenger near Central.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.
